missions.name: Build 10 building
missions.desc: Build 10 buildings of any kind anywhere in the region to officially settle it!

missions.name: Discover %x% resources
missions.desc: Clear up fog of war to discover a certain amount of resource location (plants, wildlife...)

missions.name: Explore the region
missions.desc: Clear up fog of war to reveal more than half of the region

missions.name: Discover %x% enemy buildings
missions.desc: Scout ahead and find out the location of enemy camps!

missions.name: Build 5 Towers
missions.desc: Secure the region by building at least 5 towers

missions.name: Destroy %x% enemy buildings
missions.desc: Destroy enemy camps to reduce their territory!

missions.name: Slay 100 Civs
missions.desc: Defeat 100 Civ warriors of any type to put an end to the hostilities in the region

missions.name: Gather 50 Food
missions.desc: All settlers in the region should collectively own at least 50 food to stay in shape to defend the region

missions.name: Build 3 Shops
missions.desc: Stimulate competition on the free market by setting up at least 3 shops

missions.name: Build 2 Workshops
missions.desc: Bootstrap the local manufacturing industry by building at least 2 Workshops

missions.name: Build 3 Lumber camps
missions.desc: Build at least 3 lumber camps to fuel the construction efforts in the region

missions.name: Store 20 Food
missions.desc: Strive to maintain a constant stock of 20 Food in all production buildings combined to stimulate proudction
